column5: Last summer I posted a deal from the guys @ Salt Armour for buffs to keep the sun off yer face. We the boys @ SA now have some winter ones for us winter guys. These are fleece lined and are wind proof as well. Was riding my sled for 3 hours packing down trail @ the cabin and was toasty the whole time.
I did not know u smoked, looks like a cuban to me , so wheres the salt armour sorry about that one tooth, should really get it looked at,just saying  Hermey is just a few miles north
Musta been putting along???  Reminds me of the first time I opened up my 700 and forgot to put my visor down.  Frozen eyeballs in 2.6 seconds???  I wouldnt mind a few of those buffs

Helmets work well too!  Not when you're working in tight spaces and need to swivel your head to see the trees you don't want to back into.  Musta been putting along???  Reminds me of the first time I opened up my 700 and forgot to put my visor down.  Frozen eyeballs in 2.6 seconds  I wouldnt mind a few of those buffs  Yeah not rippin' fer sure. Was packing down trail and rippin' shreds trail. Wind was blowin' pretty good though. A pair of goggles would have been handy.  http://www.sateam.company/frost-tech/
